text: Kevin Francis Meates (20 February 1930 â€“ 17 April 2022) was a New Zealand rugby union player. He played as a flanker. He was a member of the New Zealand national side, the All Blacks, in 1952. Meates was born in Greymouth, New Zealand. Meates died in Christchurch, New Zealand on 17 April 2022 at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2022 deaths Category:New Zealand rugby union players
title: Kevin Meates
